content: Hello, thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services! How can I assist you today?
I need someone to fix some faulty outlets in my house.
Absolutely, I can help you schedule an appointment for electrical service. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Nancy. Could I please have your address so we can confirm if you’re in our service area?
Thank you! Let me check if your address falls within our service area.
reason: Could not calculate service area, human help requested.

content: Hi Nancy, this is Sarah from XYZ. Sorry for the delay; we're having a minor technical issue. I can confirm that 224 Oakridge Lane is within our service area. What day and time would work best for you to have an electrician come out?
Tomorrow afternoon would be good. Maybe around 2pm?
Great, I can book you for tomorrow at 2pm. Our electrician will give you a call before arriving. Is there anything else you’d like to add or ask?
reason: Operator successfully scheduled appointment after system error.
